mapper.select: select a.*,b.sampnm,c.sptyno,d.imgnm from ord_sample_cldtl a inner join ord_sample_design b on a.sampno=b.sampno inner join ord_sample_plan c on b.plspno=c.plspno left join ( select sampno,imgnm,thumb from ord_sample_photo a where not exists(select 1 from ord_sample_photo b where a.sampno=b.sampno and a.id>b.id) ) d on b.sampno=d.sampno where a.clppno=#{clppno}
